title: Marketplace Tech for Friday, October 3, 2014
description: First up, Ibrahim Abdul-Matin, a contributor to PCMag, talks about high tech Hajj and whether or not it’s OK to take a pilgrimage selfie. And how well have you kept up with the week in tech news? Host Ben Johnson takes on Marketplace reporter Tracey Samuelson for this week's Silicon Tally.
teaser: First up, Ibrahim Abdul-Matin, a contributor to PCMag, talks about high tech Hajj and whether or not it’s OK to take a pilgrimage selfie. And how well have you kept up with the week in tech news? Host Ben Johnson takes on Marketplace reporter Tracey Samuelson for this week's Silicon Tally.
